# Disallow admin and private pages
Disallow: /admin

Disallow: /admin-login

Disallow: /dashboard.html

Disallow: /transfer.html

Disallow: /profile-2.html

Disallow: /support.html

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://twentythirdforth.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
